name: TimeTravel
description:
Use A S D W to move, Space for action

Collect the trash and maybe some keys and finally get home

In each level you have 3 steps. This steps are filled with your movements (max. 10). You can switch into the next step by clicking teh STEP button. When you have finished with all your steps, press the RUN button and the steps are made in the reverse order.

Download/extract and open Index.html to play ( Testet with Chrome)
